backgroundCharacters.name: Forum Market Crowd
backgroundCharacters.context: Typical crowd in the Roman Forum during summer

lineup.distinctiveFeature: Sitting on stool with bare knees apart, naked to the waist

lineup.clothing: Working tunic with belt, leather sandals
Toga or tunic, depending on status

backgroundCharacters.name: Temple of Saturn Visitors
backgroundCharacters.context: People around the Temple of Saturn steps

lineup.distinctiveFeature: Part of strings of slaves crossing forum
Operating from portico, smell of meat

places.name: The Roman Forum
places.description: Sprawling plaza surrounded by temples, courts, and government buildings, packed with crowds and market stalls
places.atmosphere: Hot, crowded, noisy, reeking of garlic and hair pomade, sun-baked stone
places.inhabitants: Merchants, bankers, lawyers, slaves, citizens, tourists
places.distinctiveFeatures: White marble rostrum, porticos crammed with vendors, sounds of cursing slaves, oppressive summer heat

places.name: Temple of Saturn
places.description: Imposing temple with six columns at front, single entrance, cool dark interior with ancient stone floors
places.atmosphere: Cool, dark, quiet, ancient smell, echoing footsteps
places.distinctiveFeatures: Ionic columns, hidden priests' door at back, steps crowded with illegal vendors

places.name: Falco's Office
places.description: Two cramped rooms in decrepit building, walls held together by dirt and dead bedbugs, dank and crumbling
places.atmosphere: Musty, hot, sounds of neighbors through thin walls, poverty-stricken
places.distinctiveFeatures: Sixth floor walkup, crumbling walls, dead bedbugs, view of mud track below

places.name: Aventine District
places.description: Rough neighborhood south of Circus Maximus, narrow alleys, pungent back streets, mud tracks
places.atmosphere: Hot, smelly, dangerous, populated by poor and criminal elements
places.typicalTime: All hours, more dangerous at night
places.inhabitants: Poor workers, criminals, prostitutes, struggling merchants
places.distinctiveFeatures: Dark alleys, laundries, cheap tenements, proximity to Ostian Way

places.name: Leno's Laundry
places.description: Distinctly low-class laundry on mud track, steam and smell of lye
places.distinctiveFeatures: Steam, smell of washing chemicals, owned by Falco's landlord

storyObjects.name: Multiple embroidered tunics
storyObjects.description: Several layers of fine tunics with embroidered bodice work, inappropriate for hot weather
storyObjects.significance: Indicates wealthy background of fleeing girl
storyObjects.usage: Worn by the girl, sticking to her from sweat

storyObjects.name: Jet and amber bangles
storyObjects.description: Multiple bangles from elbow to wrist in jet (black) and amber (golden)

storyObjects.name: Copper vessels and urns
storyObjects.description: Tasteful copperware including flagons, urns, and fluted fruit bowls
storyObjects.usage: Displayed on market stall, sent bouncing down temple steps

storyObjects.name: Market melons
storyObjects.description: Fresh melons displayed on forum steps for sale
